comments:

Was this the only exception in the log? What did you synchronize on? A working set? Basically, the synchronization is not able to restore the scope of the synchronization (i.e. resources, working set, etc.). This could be due to an error saving the state or an error restoring it.

traces.message: org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui.workspace-participant failed to initialize due to missing data during restore.
